Pre-Game Insights: The Guardians decided to start Matthew Boyd in Game 5 of the ALDS against his former team, the Tigers.
The Tigers are familiar with Boyd, having spent eight seasons of his career with him.
The game will feature a mentor-mentee battle between Boyd and Tarik Skubal.
The Guardians have all hands on deck for the game, with all their relievers expected to pitch.
Others: The game is a do-or-die situation for both teams, as the Guardians haven't been to the ALCS since 2016 and haven't won a World Series since 1948.
Mandy Bell covers the Guardians for MLB.com.
